actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts and Intellectual Property.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts and Intellectual Property

official_title: To provide for the appointment of 1 additional Federal district judge for the eastern district of Wisconsin, and for other purposes.
subjects: Advice and consent of the Senate

summary.text: Directs: (1) the President to appoint one additional district judge for the eastern district of Wisconsin; and (2) the chief judge of such district to designate at least one judge who shall hold court for such district in Green Bay, Wisconsin.

titles.title: To provide for the appointment of 1 additional Federal district judge for the eastern district of Wisconsin, and for other purposes.
